entry.title: Mission Failed: The Psychological Effects of Losing a War

media:group.media:title: Mission Failed: The Psychological Effects of Losing a War
media:group.media:description: Reactions to the Afghanistan withdrawal have been varied, with many celebrating, others expressing deep concern, and still others just making memes. Let's look at political and psychological research to better understand why people might respond differently to the end of a war and how that may influence future action.
